Posts.Content: i have watched the Victoria Derbyshire cancer videos charting her treatments. And found them useful and informative. I have also listened to the Steve Hewlett/Eddie Mair ones , he had oesophageal cancer, and unfortunately.... Are there any others that people recommend ? (I have BC and am on Fec having already had a lumpectomy and lymph node removal, still to come more chemo and radiotherapy and herceptin)
Posts.Title: Podcasts ?

Posts.Content: Thanks that was really interesting x
